titleSection.name: VersionOne Client for Visual Studio
titleSection.shortDescription: View and update VersionOne work items directly from Visual Studio

descriptionSection.description: The VersionOne Client for Visual Studio extends Microsoft's Visual Studio IDE by providing ability for viewing and updating VersionOne Stories, Defects, Tasks, and Tests. The integration provides access to workitems owned by the configured user, or any other workitem in an active sprint/iteration. This allows Visual Studio users to Signup, Track, and Close VersionOne workitems without needing to leave the IDE.

linksSection.title: GitHub Project for Source Code and Issues

updates.releaseNotes:
* VS Support: Added VS2013, keeping VS2012, removed VS2010.
* Added: Context menu option to open properties view for workitem details.
* Fixed: Inactivated owners now annotated. Context menu now available for items owned by inactivated members.
* Fixed: Task window throws error on first run when opened before project window.
Added: Support for installing into Visual Studio 2012

* Fixed: Honor effort tracking settings from server
* Fixed: Refresh data after changing VersionOne instance
* Fixed: Closing and quick closing require manual data refresh
* Fixed: ToDo not updating after edit
* Fixed: Owner editor combobox with multi-select

* Added: Asynchronous server calls to reduce UI locking.
* Added: Refresh project tree on demand to reduce network latency.
* Added: Add tests via context menu.
* Fixed: Proxy settings.
Fixed: Task and Test order match VersionOne UI

seed.shortDescription: Early access build. Use with caution.

sapling.shortDescription: The product is undergoing rapid growth. The code works but expect major changes.

mature.shortDescription: The product is stable. The code will continue to evolve with minimum breaking changes.
